text: EqvaitEna# karOtyaqgnayE$ tvA rAyaspOShaqdAvnnEq viShNa#vEq tvEtyA#hAnuqShTuBa# EqvaitEna# karOti SyEqnAya# tvA sOmaqBRutEq viShNa#vEq tvEtyA#ha gAyatriqyA EqvaitEna# karOtiq pa~jcaq kRutvO# gRuhNAtiq pa~jcA$kSharA paq~gktiH pA~gktO# yaqj~jO yaqj~jamEqvAva# rundhE brahmavAqdinO# vadantiq kasmA$th saqtyAd-gA#yatriqyA u#Baqyata# Atiqthyasya# kriyataq itiq yadEqvAdaH sOmaqmA- [  ] 3
